text: Valeria Gagealov (9 December 1931 – 9 February 2021) was a Romanian actress. She was born in Galați, Romania. She was known for her roles in La Moara cu noroc (1955), Columna (1968), Mihai Viteazul (1971) and Mihail, câine de circ (1979). Gagealov died in Bucharest from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Romania at the age of 89.Doliu fără margini în lumea teatrului românesc. title: Valeria Gagealov
